TopicTitle: Tail connector A overheating very quickly

Articles.Content:
Tail connector A, the long tail cone, seems to be overheating inexplicably much more quickly than other airplane parts.

I have tried a variety of planes which include the tail connector A, and this behavior occurred with all of them.

Below is a screenshot of a fresh test design where I isolated the tail cone by itself, to rule out cross-heating from multiple other parts.
Well that is weird, can you add this to the public bug tracker? The link is in the stickies
